pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Survival Analysis // Non-parametric survival analysis of exact and interval-censored observations. The methods implemented are developed by Wang (2007) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2007.00583.x, Wang (2008) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2007.10.018, Wang and Taylor (2013) doi:10.1007/s11222-012-9341-9 and Wang and Fani (2018) doi:10.1007/s11222-017-9724-z.
